name: Frozen Throne Approach
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Top-down tactical map: Frozen Throne Approach, 30x30 squares at 140 px per square (140 DPI), 30x30, distinct patterns for passable / impassable / difficult, collapses, rips, currents; marked clearly, multiple routes and flanking options, ramps, stairs, ledges, or contour lines, bold lines for walls/obstacles; fine lines for textures; high-contrast grid, icons only; no text labels; VTT-ready export, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., No embedded text labels; use icons and clear linework only. Reserve clean margins and text-safe areas for VTT overlays. Render grid and numeric ticks crisply; avoid stylized fonts entirely., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Top-down tactical map of Frozen Throne Approach.
